about.title: WHO AM I?
about.subtitle: Designer & Engineer
about.desc: I'm Camille, a fullstack engineer who fell in love with design. One day, I wanted to understand why my interfaces 'worked' but didn't feel right... So I dived into UX/UI, color palettes and elegant type. Today, I create well-coded, well-thought-out projects — and (I promise) better looking than my first HTML buttons.

contact.subtitle: LET'S STAY CONNECTED
contact.title: Let's get in touch?
contact.desc: I live in Strasbourg, but I work with the whole world. Let's chat about design, dev or big ideas. Here's how to contact me:
